name: User Title
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Used to add title to user profile in a WordPress site.

sections.installation: Copy “user-title” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory. Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.3

Verified compat with wp 4.0

1.2

Tested with WP 3.9.1

1.1

Changed form field names to prevent collisions of _POST data

1.0.1

Added license and copyright information

1.0

  • Initial version
